description:
“AutoCAD is a computer aided design software for 2D & 3D modelling and drafting.”

it was developed by Autodesk corporation.

This course includes all fundamentals basics and advanced features of AutoCAD such as 

  • Creating 3D models in autocad.
  • You will learn about different 3D tools and commands such as extrude , revolve , sweep , loft etc.
  • different solid editing tools like fillet chamfer ,draft ,etc.with examples .
  • practice model for better understanding of different commands.

You will get all Drawings files used to make this Course which help you to spend less time to learn the AutoCAD

  • anyone who wants to enhance their skills on 3D modeling can join this course .
  • you should have basic fundamental knowledge of Autocad 2D sketches and drawings for this course.
title: Autocad : convert 2D sketches into 3D Models
